sentences.sContent: It was winter and the sparrows were pecking at whatever they could find.
sentences.sCn: 已是冬天了，麻雀们能找到什么就啄食什么。

synos.tran: 许多；配克（容量单位，等于2加仑）；啄痕

phrases.pCn: n. 格里高利·派克（美国男影星）

words.tran: 啄木鸟；鹤嘴锄；穿孔器；精神；阴茎

trans.tranOther: if a bird pecks something or pecks at something, it makes quick repeated movements with its beak to try to eat part of it, make a hole in it etc

trans.tranCn: 许多；配克（容量单位，等于2加仑）；啄痕；快速轻吻
trans.tranOther: an action in which a bird pecks someone or something with its beak
